mapper.select:
SELECT
from tb_comment_status s LEFT JOIN tb_hotle_comments h on s.comment_id =h.id LEFT JOIN tb_hotel hl on h.hotel_id=hl.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u on u.id=h.user_id where s.comment_status=1 and s.comment_state !=3
and h.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or h.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.rows}

SELECT
FROM tb_comment_status s LEFT JOIN tb_item_comments i on s.comment_id=i.id LEFT JOIN tb_item AS it ON i.item_id=it.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u on u.id=i.user_id where s.comment_status=3 and s.comment_state !=3
and i.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or i.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.rows}

SELECT
FROM tb_comment_status s LEFT JOIN tb_place_comments p on s.comment_id=p.id LEFT JOIN tb_place AS pl ON p.place_id=pl.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u on u.id=p.user_id where s.comment_status=2 and s.comment_state !=3
and p.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or p.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.rows}

SELECT count(1) FROM tb_comment_status s LEFT JOIN tb_place_comments p on s.comment_id=p.id LEFT JOIN tb_item_comments i on s.comment_id=i.id LEFT JOIN tb_hotle_comments h on s.comment_id =h.id
WHERE s.comment_state !=3
and h.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or h.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
and p.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or p.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
and i.title LIKE '%${query.title}%' or i.content LIKE '%${query.title}%'
